name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a dedicated Senior System Engineer with 8 years of experience, I bring a wealth of expertise in Linux environments, particularly with **Red Hat**, **Suse**, and **Ubuntu** operating systems. I have a proven track record in high-performance solutions emphasizing service reliability, ensuring compliance with ITIL practices, and managing SLAs effectively. My technical skills encompass **Apache** web services, **MySQL** database management, and network protocols including **FTP**, **SMTP**, and **DNS**. 

I excel in scripting for system automation, monitoring service health with **Check_MK** and **Nagios**, and adeptly document processes for efficient team collaboration. My problem-solving capabilities ensure quick resolution of system issues while fostering teamwork to enhance overall productivity. Additionally, I possess strong communication skills in both **German** and **English**, enabling effective interactions with diverse teams. 

Throughout my career, I have successfully contributed to enterprise-grade platforms, emphasizing secure application development and aligning with compliance standards. My background in full-stack technologies, including **JavaScript**, **Python**, **React**, **Next.js**, and cloud services like **Azure** and **AWS**, allows me to bridge the gap between systems engineering and software development seamlessly.
